function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Improper glove usage leading to contamination","Impact":"Spread of infectious agents, increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Proper training on glove usage and disposal, strict adherence to glove usage guidelines","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment (PPE) disposal systems","People":"Medical and healthcare personnel, lab workers, other professionals using gloves","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, laboratories, employers"},{"Description":"Transmission of disease through respiratory particles","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission, potential for long-distance contagion","Mitigation":"Usage of appropriate masks and respirators, adherence to mask usage guidelines","Technologies":"Filter masks, respirators, ventilation systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers, individuals in crowded spaces","Owner":"Health authorities, employers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Ineffective use of filter masks","Impact":"Reduced protection, increased risk of exposure to contaminants","Mitigation":"Proper training on usage, implementation of training programs, strict adherence to mask usage guidelines","Technologies":"Training programs, fit-testing equipment for masks","People":"Those using filter masks and respirators","Owner":"Employers, health and safety departments"}]}
